chat.title: Up to date resources
chat.message: Basic orders look fine. Is there a way to link to http://www.bccdc.ca/health-professionals/clinical-resources/covid-19-care/treatments  so that the most up to date guidelines are available to physicians? It would also be helpful to attach a note that Pharmacy consultation recommended for available treatments at local sites.
